extractFactDictList.question: When was Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade released?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Verifiable facts: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade was released on May 24.

extractFactDictList.question: Who stars as Indiana Jones in the movie?
